footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your healing journey.
registerSubtext: Start your journey with us today.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. Please check your email to verify your account.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
contactCommunityText: Join our community and follow us on our social networks to stay updated on our upcoming ceremonies and events. We are here to answer your questions and guide you on your path to healing.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about Ayahuasca, its sacred origins, and how it can facilitate deep healing and transformation.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced guides who will accompany you with wisdom and compassion on your journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Find all the information you need here.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeTabDescription: Change the application's color palette for light and dark modes.
themeUpdateReload: The page will reload to apply the changes.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users.
allUsersDescription: List of all users in the system.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! I'm inviting you to complete the 'El Arte de Sanar' questionnaire to prepare for our ceremony. You can fill it out here: [LINK]
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
emailBodyPlaceholder: Dear user, we are writing to inform you that...
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not submitted the questionnaire yet.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any pre-existing medical conditions? (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, etc.)
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication, including antidepressants or supplements?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications and supplements.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of mental health conditions? (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please provide details about your mental health history.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or achieve...
chatHistorySubtitle: Review past conversations with the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full chat history.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies scheduled at this moment. Please check back later or contact us for more information.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to this ceremony. The changes will be visible to all users immediately.
addCeremonyDescription: Create a new ceremony that will be visible to all users.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this ceremony?
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony data.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. You can still edit it later.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: The ceremony will be hidden from the main list but not deleted. You can reactivate it later.
ceremonyMovedToPast: It will now appear in the 'Past Events' section.
errorFinishingCeremony: Failed to mark ceremony as finished.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the guide's profile.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the experienced and compassionate team that will accompany you on your healing journey. Each of our guides is deeply committed to your well-being and transformation.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore all our upcoming and past events. Each ceremony is a unique opportunity for healing and self-discovery.
chatbotWelcome: Welcome. I am your spiritual guide. How can I help you on your path to healing today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to access the full experience, including questionnaires and personalized follow-up. It only takes a minute.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please complete this form honestly. Your answers are confidential and will help us ensure a safe and beneficial experience for you.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the form. Your information has been saved. You can review your answers below or proceed to the preparation guide.
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your information has been successfully saved.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
dialogSuccessDescription: You have successfully completed the first step. Now, let's prepare for your experience.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with Ayahuasca or other master plants?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: If yes, please briefly describe your previous experiences.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral psychoactive brew from the Amazon, made from the Chacruna leaf (Psychotria viridis) and the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi). For centuries, it has been used by indigenous communities in sacred rituals for healing, divination, and spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew induces altered states of consciousness, opening doors to the subconscious and spiritual dimensions. During the experience, it is common to have profound visions, emotional releases, and deep insights about oneself and the universe. It is a powerful tool for introspection and personal growth.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than just a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a master plant, a spiritual guide that teaches, purifies, and heals. Each ceremony is a dialogue with this ancient wisdom, an opportunity to reconnect with your essence and the web of life.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Ayahuasca helps to release emotional blockages, understand behavioral patterns, and find answers to deep-seated personal questions.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the healing of past traumas, depression, and anxiety, promoting a state of inner peace and emotional well-being.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Participants often report a sense of unity with nature, the universe, and their own spirituality, rediscovering their purpose in life.
groupCeremonyDescription: Held in a space of collective respect and support, the group energy enhances the healing experience, creating a web of shared consciousness.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, designed to address specific needs and provide a space of deep introspection with the direct guidance of the master.
preparationProcessDescription: The journey begins weeks before, with a special diet and mental focus to purify the body and mind.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The night of the ceremony is a deep dive into your inner self, guided by icaros (sacred songs) and the wisdom of the medicine.
experienceProcessDescription: A transformative journey where you confront your shadows, celebrate your light, and reconnect with your essence.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we support you in integrating the lessons learned into your daily life for lasting change.
dietTitle: The Dieta: Nourishing Body and Soul
dietSubtitle: A preparatory diet is essential to cleanse the body and increase sensitivity to the medicine. It is recommended to start at least one week before the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList: White meats (chicken, fish) in moderation and boiled or grilled
prohibitedFoodsList: Spicy, fried, or heavily processed foods
mentalPrepSubtitle: The state of your mind and spirit is as important as your physical diet.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and cultivate a state of receptivity.
reflectionDescription: Take time to disconnect from daily distractions and connect with nature.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can be an intense emotional process. It is important to come with an open heart, willing to confront and release stored emotions. Trust the process and the guides who will be there to support you. The medicine will show you what you need to see for your healing.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure your comfort and well-being during the experience.
comfortItemsList: A change of clothes for the next day
essentialsList: A notebook and pen for journaling
Any personal amulet or sacred object (optional)
